tool_description: Lists and Describes Each I-Ching Symbol
title: I-Ching Reference

api_list.name: Hexagram(64)
api_list.description:
The King Wen Sequence 

id range is from 1 to 64
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://i-ching-reference.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/hexagrams/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "i-ching-reference.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Unigram(2)
api_list.description:
Yin and Yang

id is either 1 or 2
